title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Limistéir Pleanála
text_raw:
1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Limistéir Pleanála 

Teanga Ghaeltachta a Ainmniú), (Uimh. 4), 2021 a ghairm den Ordú seo.
text_norm: 1 feadfar tordu um acht na gaeltachta 2012 (limisteir pleanala teanga ghaeltachta ainmniu) (uimh 4) 2021 ghairm den ordu seo

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. Tá na limistéir a shonraítear sa Sceideal ainmnithe mar Limistéar
text_raw:
2. Tá na limistéir a shonraítear sa Sceideal ainmnithe mar Limistéar 
Pleanála Teanga Ghaeltachta chun críocha alt 7(2) d’Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 
(Uimh. 34 de 2012). 

Foilsíodh fógra san “Iris Oifigiúil” an 28 Nollaig, 2021, á rá go 
ndearnadh an Ionstraim Reachtúil seo. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [710] 3 

SCEIDEAL 

Limistéar Pleanála Teanga: An tEachréidh, Co. na Gaillimhe 

(1) Na limistéir toghroinne i gContae na Gaillimhe seo a leanas: Baile Chláir, 

An Carn Mór agus Eanach Dhúin (Gaillimh). 

(2) An chuid sin de thoghroinn ceantair Bhaile an Teampaill i gcontae na 
Gaillimhe atá comhdhéanta de na bailte fearainn seo a leanas: Baile an 
Gharráin agus An Poll Caoin. 

(3) An chuid sin de thoghroinn ceantair Cheathrú an Bhrúnaigh i gcontae na 
Gaillimhe atá comhdhéanta de na bailte fearainn seo a leanas: Ceathrú an 
Bhrúnaigh, An Chluain, Cluain Mhic Cáinín (Dún Coillín), Cluain Mhic 
Cáinín (Gaillimh), Coill Uachtair, Gort an Chalaidh, An Pollach 
Riabhach, An Saighleán agus Sceach Liag. 

(4) An chuid sin de thoghroinn ceantair Leacach Beag i gcontae na Gaillimhe 
atá comhdhéanta de na bailte fearainn seo a leanas: Cill Torróg agus Na 
Croisíní. 

(5) An chuid sin de thoghroinn ceantair Lisín an Bhealaigh i gcontae na 
Gaillimhe atá comhdhéanta den bhaile fearainn seo a leanas: An Carn 
Mór Thoir. 

Arna thabhairt faoi mo láimh, 
 8 Nollaig 2021. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

 Aire Stáit ag an Roinn Tuarasóireachta, Cultúir, 
Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt agus Meán. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [710] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 710 of 2021 

________________ 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT LANGUAGE 
PLANNING AREAS) (NO. 4) ORDER 2021 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [710] 5 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 710 of 2021 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT LANGUAGE 
PLANNING AREAS) (NO. 4) ORDER 2021 

I, JACK CHAMBERS, Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by 
section 7(2) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted by the 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht (Alteration of Name of Department and Title 
of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 
(S.I. No. 547 of 2020), hereby order as follows:

chlair carn mor agus eanach dhuin (gaillimh) (2) chuid sin de thoghroinn ceantair bhaile teampaill gcontae na gaillimhe ata comhdheanta de na bailte fearainn seo leanas baile gharrain agus poll caoin (3) chuid sin de thoghroinn ceantair cheathru bhrunaigh gcontae na gaillimhe ata comhdheanta de na bailte fearainn seo leanas ceathru bhrunaigh chluain cluain mhic cainin (dun coillin) cluain mhic seo leanas cill torrog agus na croisini (5) chuid sin de thoghroinn ceantair lisin bhealaigh gcontae na gaillimhe ata comhdheanta den bhaile fearainn seo leanas carn mor thoir arna thabhairt faoi mo title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of 

Gaeltacht Language Planning Areas) (No. 4) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht language planning areas) (no 4) order 2021

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. The areas specified in the Schedule are designated to be a Gaeltacht
text_raw:
2. The areas specified in the Schedule are designated to be a Gaeltacht 
Language Planning Area for the purposes of section 7(2) of the Gaeltacht Act 
2012 (No. 34 of 2012). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [710]

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: Language Planning Area: An tEachréidh, Co. Galway
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Language Planning Area: An tEachréidh, Co. Galway 

(1) The following electoral division areas in County Galway: Baile Chláir, 

An Carn Mór and Eanach Dhúin (Gaillimh). 

(2) That part of the electoral division area of Baile an Teampaill in County 
Galway which consists of the following townlands: Baile an Gharráin 
agus An Poll Caoin. 

(3) That part of the electoral division area of Ceathrú an Bhrúnaigh in 
County Galway which consists of the following townlands: Ceathrú an 
Bhrúnaigh, An Chluain, Cluain Mhic Cáinín (Dún Coillín), Cluain Mhic 
Cáinín (Gaillimh), Coill Uachtair, Gort an Chalaidh, An Pollach 
Riabhach, An Saighleán agus Sceach Liag. 

(4) That part of the electoral division area of Leacach Beag in County 
Galway which consists of the following townlands: Cill Torróg agus Na 
Croisíní. 

(5) That part of the electoral division area of Lisín an Bhealaigh in County 
Galway which consists of the following townland: An Carn Mór Thoir. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 8 December 2021 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

 Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, 

Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [710] 7
